resources.string:
Who We Are

Team 2020 is a TDP - Emerging Technologies intern group formed to create a reservation app for AT&T. Through utilization of the Agile Scrum Process and the latest in Android technology, we strive to provide AT&T employees a quick and easy service for reserving seats in the new Workplace 2020 areas.

Team 2020 Members

Brandon Jaster - Product Owner
Laura Laine - Scrum Master
Sidalia Aguilar - Developer
Andrew Toscano - Developer
Charlie Albright - Developer
Devang Mistry - Developer
Emely Villeda-Principe - Developer
Q. What is the QuickReserve App?

A. QuickReserve is a reservation service for AT&T employees on the 14th Floor of Two Bell. The idea is to make the work environment more efficient by allowing users to easily and quickly find open seats, anytime and anywhere.
Q. What does the QuickReserve function do?

A. The QuickReserve function allows users to reserve a seat for a certain date and time period without the hassle of choosing a workspace. The app chooses a seat based on the availability of your Favorite seats. If none of your favorites are available, the first available seat is chosen.
Q. What does the QR code scanner function do?

A. QR code scanner allows users to reserve seats for any date, but only for full-day work periods (8 AM – 5 PM). Simply find the workstation you’d like to reserve, scan the QR Code on the seat, and make your reservation.
Q. What does the Friend Finder function do?

A. The Friend Finder function allows users to look up a fellow AT&T employee (through their ATTUID) and view their reservations for the day. In this way you can easily find fellow team members to sit by in order to collaborate and increase productivity.
Q. Can I make more than one reservation a day?
A. You can make as many reservations a day you want, as long as the time periods don’t overlap.
Q. What is the earliest I can make a reservation?
A. You can reserve any seat up to 2 weeks in advance.
Q. Can I edit or delete a reservation once it has been made?

A. Yes. The My Reservations page lists all reservations you currently have. Tapping on the View Details button will allow you to see the details of that reservation, and from there you can choose to Edit or Delete your reservation.
